W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
October 6, 1958
PHONE WO 8-
received
NAES HEADQUARTERS
OCT 7 1958
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Exec. Director
Nat'l. Ass’n. of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I have revised plans for my trip slightly. I need to go to
the University of Nebraska for the morning of the l4th and
■will arrive in Omaha about the middle of the afternoon instead
of early that morning.
Sincerely,
Maurice F. Seay
MFS/fh
